name: KeyCode.WTF
description:
Description:

KeyCode.WTF is a frantic game of survival where your controls change often and at random. Unless you find the right layout again, everything is Out of (your) Control.

Gameplay:

  • Evacuate the circle that spawns around before it turns red
  • Evade triangles which hunt you down
  • Evolve along with your controls
  • Note: Try using one hand for an extreme challenge

Controls: (All WASD format)

  • WASD
  • TFGH
  • IJKL
  • SZXC
  • GVBN
  • KM , .  (comma and period)

This game was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020 - Theme: Out of Control

Developer: Scott W. 

Music: Kai Engel (freemusicarchive.org)

Sound FX: KenneyNL (kenney.nl)
